title: Social Media and SEO Marketing Guru
job_overview:
We are seeking an experienced and passionate Social Media and SEO Marketing Guru to join our team! This full-time, work-from-home position is perfect for someone with over three years of experience in social media management and SEO. The ideal candidate is autonomous, results-driven, flexible, friendly, and dedicated to achieving outstanding results for our two new ventures: a Shopify dropshipping business and a web hosting company, both at their exciting launch stage.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and execute social media strategies to build brand awareness, engagement, and drive traffic for both the dropshipping business and the web hosting company.
• Optimize website content and product listings for SEO to increase organic search visibility.
• Monitor and analyze performance metrics, providing regular reports and insights to guide strategy adjustments.
• Collaborate with the team to ensure that marketing efforts are aligned with overall business goals and launch plans.

Requirements:
• Proven experience in managing social media accounts and implementing SEO best practices.
• Ability to work independently and efficiently in a remote setting.
• Strong communication skills and a positive, proactive attitude.

If you’re excited about helping new businesses thrive and want to make a real impact, we’d love to hear from you!
